The figures in this tool do not include any tax charges that arise as a result of exceeding the pension allowances:
· The Annual Allowance is a restriction on contributions and is currently £40,000
· It may reduce to a minimum of £10,000 if your adjusted annual income exceeds £150,000
· If you access your pension flexibly your Money Purchase Annual Allowance reduces to £4,000
· The Lifetime Allowance is a limit on your total pension fund from all sources and is currently £1,055,000

The growth rate must be bigger than the Inflation plus the Pension Change. Please makes changes above as required
